channel.title: Comments on: An Insider’s Look at BendPoly’s First Summer Session

item.title: By: Amber Caisse
item.dc:creator: Amber Caisse
item.description: Great post Alex! As a fellow BendPoly student, I couldn't agree with you more. This program is addressing a real pain point for recent or approaching college grads. While I don't regret the time and effort I spent obtaining my college degrees, I am thrilled and grateful to be getting the extra polishing that BendPoly is providing in terms of hands-on applicable learning, networking opportunities and job placement support. BendPoly is a beacon of light for the future!
item.content:encoded: Great post Alex! As a fellow BendPoly student, I couldn’t agree with you more. This program is addressing a real pain point for recent or approaching college grads. While I don’t regret the time and effort I spent obtaining my college degrees, I am thrilled and grateful to be getting the extra polishing that BendPoly is providing in terms of hands-on applicable learning, networking opportunities and job placement support. BendPoly is a beacon of light for the future!
